testcase.classname: Book Bus Ticket on AbhiBus Website
testcase.name: Book a bus from Bangalore to Coimbatore
testcase.system-out: Given I open the AbhiBus website............................................passed And I select Bangalore as the from station..................................passed And I select Coimbatore as the to station...................................passed And I select travel date....................................................passed When I click on the Search button...........................................passed Then I should be redirected to the AbhiBus search results page..............passed And I should see the AbhiBus logo on the page...............................passed And I select the seat.......................................................passed And I select Majestic as the boarding point.................................passed And I select choose seat....................................................passed And I Enter name............................................................passed And I Enter gender..........................................................passed And I Enter number..........................................................passed And I Enter email...........................................................passed
